details: I am working as a Software Engineer in a Fintech company named Finartz for 1 years. I started as a mobile application developer here then changed my career to Java Backend Engineer here, same company. I participated in 2 different digital wallet application projects, Hayat Finans and Banka Kombetare Tregtare. The project is designed with microservice architecture, utilizing technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, Mysql and redis.

My second school internship was in Argenova company. I worked as an intern for 1 months; June, 2022 to July, 2022. Argenova organize summer internship program every summer. They divide students by group and want that developing something with high vision. I was team lead and we developed a mobile app about healthy life and dietic.

As a Part-Time Application Engineer, I utilized React and React Native to develop and enhance web and mobile applications. My role involved collaborating with the development team to implement new features troubleshoot issues, and optimize performance, ensuring a seamless user experience.

My first internship was in HTMLTEK company. I worked as an intern for 2 months; July, 2022 to September, 2022. My stacks were dotnet and vanillia js (HTML, CSS, Javascript) at company. So I was Junior Full Stack developer. I developed a simple web application.
